text: Laura Thorn (born 1999 or 2000), is a Luxembourgish singer and songwriter. She represented Luxembourg at the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 with the song "La poupée monte le son". ==Career== On 18 November 2024, Laura Thorn was announced as one of the seven seven participating acts taking part in Luxembourg Song Contest 2025, a competition organised by RTL to select its entry for the Eurovision Song Contest 2025. Her song, "La poupée monte le son" was along with the other six song were presented on 19 December 2024. The Final took place on 25 January 2025, Thorn won the competition with a total of 184 points, she won the jury and finished second in the televote. At Eurovision, Thorn performed during the second semi-final on 15 May 2025, she made it to the Final finishing 7th in the semi-final with 62 points. The Final took place on 17 May 2025, she finished in 22nd place. ==Discography== ===Singles=== Title Year Peak chart positions Album LUX FIN LTU SWE Heat. SWI UK Down.
